findings.title: Mint function calls should check for zero amounts
findings.description: Mint function calls should check for zero amounts to avoid reverting the transaction when rewards are reduced to zero and when foam minted is 0 in enterStaking() function.

findings.title: Potential gas consumption reduction in cross contract calls
findings.description: Mint function calls should check for zero amounts to avoid reverting the transaction when rewards are reduced to zero and reduce gas consumed in cross contract calls.
